title: Multiple notifications are not expanding in Android OS 10
content:
Since getting the Android 10 update I am not able to pull multiple notification from the Notification center

Steps:
-Get Slickdeals app installed
-Sign in and add multiple deal alerts
-Now wait for deal alerts
-From the notification center you can see multiple notifications but you cant expand and click individually

Expected Result : You should be able to expand and open each notification alert. This was working fine until I upgraded to Android 10

Video URL
